forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then partly cloudy for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning light rain. High near 55F. SSW winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low near 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 60F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low near 10C. S winds at 10 to 15 km/h, increasing to 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low around 50F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 13C. SSE winds shifting to W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 56F. SSE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 52F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 43F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms in the morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High near 10C. S winds shifting to W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 51F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. SE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 56F. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 57F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early with showers developing late. Low 46F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 52F. S winds shifting to W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 43F. NNW winds shifting to SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 11C. S winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 52F. S winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 55F. SSE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low around 45F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
